headline: Is L3Harris Technologies, Inc. (LHX) the Best Defense Stock to Buy According to Billionaires?
summary: We recently published a list of 13 Best Defense Stocks to Buy According to Billionaires. In this article, we are going to take a look at where L3Harris Technologies, Inc.
